1. Eels’ escape shows ‘the fight for survival doesn’t end after being eaten,’ scientist says  CNN
  2. Watch baby Japanese eel escape from stomach of predator in X-ray video  Livescience.com
  3. Japanese eels can escape predators’ stomach through their gills, finds study  The Guardian
  4. Amazing Footage Shows How Eels Escape Death After Being Swallowed  ScienceAlert
  5. The Terrifying Way That Eels Escape a Hungry Fish’s Stomach  The New York Times
